name: As The Dark Lord Commands
description:
As The Dark Lord Commands is a turn based strategy game that puts you in the role of The Dark Lord, ruling over your empire on a quest to overtake the kingdoms of Aetheria.  

Build up powerful armies lead by unique commanders to loot, intimidate, and destroy the lands of your enemies.  Command units in tactical combat and outwit your opponents.  Defend your Lair from Adventurers as well as the armies of the Humans, Elves and Dwarves.  Manage  your empire and keep your minions from becoming insubordinate.   Build structures across the map  to enhance your positions and maintain your stranglehold.  Do you have what it takes to Rule?

-- Note: Game is in final Beta testing, testers needed.
